sections.title: Guild Devil (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Guild Devil class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Classically Trained (Ex) (Guild Devil)
sections.description: Allows use of Weapon Finesse with a one-handed longsword despite it not being a light weapon.

sections.title: Founders’ Favor (Su) (Guild Devil)
sections.description: Provides a pool of favor points that can be spent to enhance skill checks or activate founder-inspired abilities.

sections.title: Eye of the Seer (Su) (Guild Devil)
sections.description: Allows seeing internal workings of devices for Disable Device bonuses, and later seeing through walls and doors.

sections.title: Council’s Guidance (Su) (Guild Devil)
sections.description: Grants speed bonus and skill bonuses in urban environments, with enhanced chase mechanics.

sections.title: Council’s Craftsmanship (Sp) (Guild Devil)
sections.description: Provides spell-like abilities to manipulate wood, including warp wood and meld into wood effects.

sections.title: Council’s Bounty (Sp) (Guild Devil)
sections.description: Grants water breathing for 24 hours as an immediate action, affecting multiple creatures.

sections.title: Council’s Recovery (Sp) (Guild Devil)
sections.description: Provides healing and restoration spell-like abilities including cure serious wounds and restoration effects.

sections.title: Council’s Shroud (Su) (Guild Devil)
sections.description: Grants bonuses against city guards including skill bonuses, AC bonus, and saving throw bonuses.

sections.title: Sneak Attack (Ex) (Guild Devil)
sections.description: Grants sneak attack damage that increases with level, functioning like the rogue class feature.
